1. Install required libs

sudo apt-get install subversion autoconf libnetcdf-dev libxml2-dev libproj-dev

Also install the following:

flip, netcdf-bin, nco

Useful Linux Commands:

1. top - show cpu usages
2. who
3. df -h - show disk space
4. chmod - change file permission.
5. man - show manual on a command.
